gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 117, Heat 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Heat, 117-115. Myles Turner recorded 22 points and 13 rebounds for the Pacers, while T.J. McConnell added 22 points and five assists in the victory. Jimmy Butler (27 points, seven rebounds, eight assists) and Bam Adebayo (20 points, 12 rebounds, three assists) combined for 47 points for the Heat in the losing effort. The Pacers have won back-to-back games as they improve to 45-34 on the season, while the Heat fall to 43-35.
